data.title: Global Compact Network USA
data.meta_description: Global Compact Network USA is the USA Local Network for the United Nations Global Compact, the Secretary-General's corporate sustainability initiative.

In-Person Events

UN Global Compact

2024 UN Global Compact Leader's Summit

The 2024 UN Global Compact Leaders Summit will convene business leaders, SDG stakeholders, civil society, Government and UN officials from around the globe who are committed to raising the bar on sustainability. 

Enhancing Your Companyâs Climate Impact with the United Nations Global Compact

Join us for a panel and interactive discussions to learn how your company can engage with the UN Global Compact Network USA to scale its climate action strategies. 
